what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal dagnn provide minimal package quickly constructing neural network architectures simple syntax. Essentially specify directed acyclic graph neural network layers using list formulas, dagnn constructs full torch::nn_module() can used downstream deep learning workflows.
